channel.description: Recent content in Filedirs on devopstales

item.description: Parst of the Kubernetes series Part1a: Install K8S with ansible Part1b: Install K8S with kubeadm Part2: Intall metal-lb with K8S Part3: Install Nginx ingress to K8S Part4: Install cert-manager to K8S Part5a: Use local persisten volume with K8S Part5b: Use ceph persisten volume with K8S Part5c: Use ceph CSI persisten volume with K8S Part5d: Use Project Longhorn as persisten volume with K8S Part6: Use Helm with K8S Part7: Tillerless helm2 install Part8: Kubernetes Dashboard SSO Part9: Kuberos for K8S Part10: Gangwayl for K8S Part11: Velero Backup for K8S

Parst of the Openshift series Part1: Install Opeshift Part2: Add new workers to Openshift cluster Part3: Chane the certificates of the Openshift cluster Part4: LDAP authentication for Openshift Part5: Keycloak SSO authentication for Openshift Part6: Gitlab SSO authentication for Openshift Part7a: Ceph persistent storage for Openshift Part7b: vSphere persistent storage for Openshift Part8: Helm on Openshift Part9: Tillerless Helm on Openshift Part10: Use external docker registry on Openshift Part11: Secondary route on Openshift Part12: Use Letsencrypt on Openshift Part13: Create Openshift operators Part14: Convert docker-compose file to Opeshift
